resources.string: Start by selecting an Affinity and Card Type to generate stats!
Change the Lv (level) and Asc (ascension) values to see updates to stats
Reset stats by setting the level to 0
Increasing Asc (ascension) will increase your man Lv (level) by 2
Guardians with affinity Robotic, Physical or Beast do physical damage that is greatly negated by Physical Defense
Guardians with affinity Elemental, Psychic or Brainiac do magical damage that is greatly negated by Magical Defense
Guardians with affinity Robotic, Physical or Beast rely on Str (strength) to deal damage to opponents
Guardians with affinity Elemental, Psychic or Brainiac rely on Wis (wisdom) to deal damage to opponents
Successful crit (critical) attacks will add an additional 20% bonus damage to overall damage dealt
IMPORTANT: Current stats are outdated! Stats do not regenerate automatically. Press the regenerate button to update stats
